stimulusHtml: A beam of electrons is directed toward a pair of narrow, rectangular slits that is near a screen. An interference pattern is observed on the screen due to the interaction between the electrons and the slits. Which statement best describes the pattern?
choicesHtml: The pattern is of two bright bands. Each band is in the shape of a circle.
The pattern is of two bright bands. Each band is in the shape of a rectangle.
The pattern is of alternating bright and dark bands. Each band is in the shape of a circle.
The pattern is of alternating bright and dark bands. Each band is in the shape of a rectangle.
